subject: Re: ATTN: Website Amendment- Blue Ocean Wealth Management
preview: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year to you too Chris!

full_threads.body: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year to you too Chris!

Hi Ben, 

Great to read, thanks for the very detailed instructions. 

If we don't speak before the break, I wish you, Christian, and the team a safe and Merry Christmas.

Hey Chris,

It looks great! Thank you for your work on this one!
1h 15 mins added to harvest and closed. (60 mins work, 15 mins check/QC)

Hi Ben, 

Great news, we have completed the updates. 

Please review and let us know if there are any further changes.

hi, chris. uhm i didnt use the jpeg images they provided. i just tried to fix the svg and exported it.
please check it now.

https://blueoceanwealth.com.au/

30mins

Hi Ben, 

Amazing, thanks. We'll go through these and polish/refine the updates.
@glen can you please see if the supplied icons will work?

Hey Chris,

I have uploaded the icons to the dropbox- all of them were icons that were provided by Microsoft PowerPoint with the exception of the one used for Esate Planning. That is one I created myself by drawing shapes.

Hopefully the JPEGs provided help. If not, I am happy for you to use similar icons.

Thank you

Hi Ben, 

We have completed a majority of the requested updates and are working through the final polishing of the mobile view layouts. 

Can you please send us the icons used in the PPT? It appears pulling them from the PPT is causing some quality and sizing issues. 

You can upload them here: https://www.dropbox.com/request/4bCmY1p8IFZ3ulDBPkbt

hi, @chris please check
https://blueoceanwealth.com.au/

there is an issue regarding the last 3 icons. thanks
30mins

Hi Ben, 

Thanks for the prompt reply, we'll get started and loop back as soon as updates are available.

Hi @glen, can you please assist with this ticket? 

1. Please complete the tasks on a draft page for customer review. 
2. The icons found in the PPT can be used on the website as they are SVGs.

We have provided the client with an ETA on Tuesday close of business. 

Any questions, please let me know.

Hey Chris,

That should be fine. Thank you!

Hi Ben, 

Thanks for sharing the detailed updates.

We expect to complete these updates in 2-3 hours, which mean as a worst case, it would be over your monthly allocation by 1 hour. 

Please confirm this is ok and we'll get started ASAP. If we receive approval to proceed promptly, we expect to have these updates completed by COB Tuesday.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
@heath please take a quick look at this request? I estimate we need 3-4 hours to complete, do you think that is accurate?

My plan is to get client approval first.

Hi Team,

We would like to implement a few changes to our website.

Please reformat the current section (below)-



To have the following layout as provided (below)-



Attached are Powerpoint files for your reference which also content the desired layout for the mobile version of the website.

If this task exceeds our allotted time for this month, please inform me and we can schedule its completion for the following month.

Thank you!

Benjamin Herzog

Director | Blue Ocean Wealth Management


A: Lvl 1, 9/3 Wellington St, Kew VIC 3101

P: +61 427 383 652 | 1800 303 808

W: blueoceanwealth.com.au

Blue Ocean Wealth Management acknowledges and pays respect to the traditional owners and custodians of the land on which we work and live. These lands are, always were and always will be Aboriginal land.

IMPORTANT: The contents of this email and any attachments are confidential. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party, without a written consent of the sender. If you received this

message by mistake, please reply to this message and follow with its deletion, so that we can ensure such a mistake does not occur in the future.
